BlockLicense.CopyrightStatement: Copyright (c) 2018, Linz Center of Mechatronics GmbH (LCM) http://www.lcm.at/ All rights reserved.
BlockLicense.Header: This file is part of X2C. http://x2c.lcm.at/ $LastChangedRevision: 2128 $ $LastChangedDate:: 2021-02-02 14:38:09 +0100#$

ControlBlock.Description: High frequency square wave voltage injection: - Voltage Injection: injects a square-wave voltage signal with fPWM/2 and adjustable amplitude - Estimator: Calculates rotor angle and speed based on current response due to voltage injection BE AWARE: This block needs to be in synchronization with the current controller!

MaskInport.Name: iAlpha
MaskInport.Description: Direct current in fixed coordinate system

MaskInport.Name: iBeta
MaskInport.Description: Quadrature current in fixed coordinate system

MaskInport.Name: n0
MaskInport.Description: Initial speed preloaded at rising edge of Enable signal

MaskInport.Name: phi0
MaskInport.Description: Initial rotor angle preloaded at rising edge of Enable signal

MaskInport.Name: Enable
MaskInport.Description: Enable == 0: Deactivation of this block; Outputs are set to zero Enable 0->1: Preload of angle and speed for internal integrators Enable == 1: Activation of this block

MaskOutport.Name: ud
MaskOutport.Description: Once the HFI is activated, on Ud the square-wave voltage signal is present that is supposed to be injected.

MaskOutport.Name: i_eps
MaskOutport.Description: Error current in q-direction due to HF-injection. (Only needed for parametrization of block.)

MaskParameter.Name: U_inj
MaskParameter.Description: Amplitude of injected square wave voltage

MaskParameter.Name: Jp
MaskParameter.Description: Moment of inertia of rotor (and load)

MaskParameter.Name: I_inj
MaskParameter.Description: Error current due to HF voltage injection into wrong direction

MaskParameter.Name: fo
MaskParameter.Description: Frequency of observer pole. The higher the pole is chosen, the more dynamic is the angle estimation.

MaskParameter.Name: p
MaskParameter.Prompt: Motor Data: p (Number of pole pairs)

MaskParameter.Name: n_max
MaskParameter.Description: Maximum (mechanical) speed (Only used for scaling in fixed point implementations)

MaskParameter.Name: I_max
MaskParameter.Description: Maximum current (Only used for scaling in fixed point implementations)

MaskParameter.Name: U_max
MaskParameter.Description: Maximum voltage (Only used for scaling in fixed point implementations)

MaskParameter.Name: ts_fact
MaskParameter.Description: Multiplication factor of base sampling time (in integer format).

MaskParameter.Name: estimation
MaskParameter.Description: Select where to place the emphasis of the speed output: dynamic or noise

MaskParameter.Name: method
MaskParameter.Description: Discretization method of of used LTI systems (PI, I)

ImplementationParameter.Name: uInjAmp
ImplementationParameter.Description: Amplitude of injected square wave voltage

ImplementationParameter.Name: iyArr
ImplementationParameter.Description: Array with recent current values in estimated y coordinate

ImplementationParameter.Name: i_old_torque
ImplementationParameter.Description: Torque integrator value from previous cycle

ImplementationParameter.Name: i_old_speed
ImplementationParameter.Description: Speed integrator value from previous cycle

ImplementationParameter.Name: i_old_angle
ImplementationParameter.Description: Angle integrator value from previous cycle

ImplementationParameter.Name: sfrb0_torque
ImplementationParameter.Description: Shift factor for PI coefficient b0

ImplementationParameter.Name: sfrb1_torque
ImplementationParameter.Description: Shift factor for PI coefficient b1

ImplementationParameter.Name: sfrb0_speed
ImplementationParameter.Description: Shift factor for PI coefficient b0

ImplementationParameter.Name: sfrb1_speed
ImplementationParameter.Description: Shift factor for PI coefficient b1

ImplementationParameter.Name: sfrb0_angle
ImplementationParameter.Description: Shift factor for PI coefficient b0

ImplementationParameter.Name: sfrb1_angle
ImplementationParameter.Description: Shift factor for PI coefficient b1

ImplementationParameter.Name: rawSpeed
ImplementationParameter.Description: If true, the input to the angle integrator is the signal given to Speed output If false, the output of the speed integrator is the signal given to Speed output

ImplementationParameter.Name: uInjAmp
ImplementationParameter.Description: Amplitude of injected square wave voltage

ImplementationParameter.Name: iyArr
ImplementationParameter.Description: Array with recent current values in estimated y coordinate

ImplementationParameter.Name: i_old_torque
ImplementationParameter.Description: Torque integrator value from previous cycle

ImplementationParameter.Name: i_old_speed
ImplementationParameter.Description: Speed integrator value from previous cycle

ImplementationParameter.Name: i_old_angle
ImplementationParameter.Description: Angle integrator value from previous cycle

ImplementationParameter.Name: sfrb0_torque
ImplementationParameter.Description: Shift factor for PI coefficient b0

ImplementationParameter.Name: sfrb1_torque
ImplementationParameter.Description: Shift factor for PI coefficient b1

ImplementationParameter.Name: sfrb0_speed
ImplementationParameter.Description: Shift factor for PI coefficient b0

ImplementationParameter.Description: Shift factor for PI coefficient b1

ImplementationParameter.Name: rawSpeed
ImplementationParameter.Description: If true, the input to the angle integrator is the signal given to Speed output If false, the output of the speed integrator is the signal given to Speed output

ImplementationParameter.Description: Amplitude of injected square wave voltage

ImplementationParameter.Name: iyArr

ControlBlock.Description: Calculation of initial rotor angle.

MaskInport.Name: Enable
MaskInport.Description: Enable = false: Outputs are zero. Enable = true: Initial rotor angle is determined and enable signal for HF injection is given.

MaskOutport.Name: U_A
MaskOutport.Description: Voltage to be applied in phase A

MaskOutport.Name: U_B
MaskOutport.Description: Voltage to be applied in phase B

MaskOutport.Name: U_C
MaskOutport.Description: Voltage to be applied in phase C

MaskOutport.Name: Ready
MaskOutport.Description: Signal to indicate end of initial position detection

MaskParameter.Name: U_pulse
MaskParameter.Description: Amplitude of voltage pulses used for determination of initial rotor anlge

MaskParameter.Name: U_max
MaskParameter.Description: Phase voltage scaling value (Only used for scaling in fixed point implementations)

MaskParameter.Name: ts_fact
MaskParameter.Description: Multiplication factor of base sampling time (in integer format).

ImplementationParameter.Name: dir
ImplementationParameter.Description: Direction of voltage pulse: DIR=-1->neg. Phase A, -2=neg. phase B, -3=neg. phase C, 1=phase A, 2=phase B, 3=phase C

ImplementationParameter.Name: max_ia_pos
ImplementationParameter.Description: Maximum current in phase A direction

ImplementationParameter.Name: max_ia_neg
ImplementationParameter.Description: Maximum current in negative phase A direction

ImplementationParameter.Name: max_ib_pos
ImplementationParameter.Description: Maximum current in phase B direction

ImplementationParameter.Name: max_ib_neg
ImplementationParameter.Description: Maximum current in negative phase B direction

ImplementationParameter.Name: max_ic_pos
ImplementationParameter.Description: Maximum current in phase C direction

MaskParameter.Description: Rising time in seconds. Slew rate will be 1/Tr.

MaskParameter.Name: Tf
MaskParameter.Description: Falling time in seconds. Slew rate will be 1/Tf.

MaskParameter.Name: ts_fact
MaskParameter.Description: Multiplication factor of base sampling time (in integer format).

ControlBlock.Description: Merged Clark and park transform. d=a*cos(theta)+((a*2b)*1.732)*sin(theta) q=-a*sin(theta)+((a*2b)*1.732)*cos(theta) Moves a three-axis, two-dimensional coordinate system, referenced to the stator, onto a two-axis system, keeping the same reference. The two-axis orthogonal system with the axis called alpha-beta transform into another two-axis system that is rotating with the rotor flux. Two-axis rotating coordinate system is called the d-q axis. Theta represents the rotor angle.

ControlBlock.Description: Merged Inverse Park, Inverse Clark and Space Vector Modulation Park_inv: alpha = d*cos(theta) - q*sin(theta) beta = d*sin(theta) + q*cos(theta) Clark_inv: a = beta b = (-beta + 1.732*alpha)/2 c = (-beta - 1.732*alpha)/2 SVM: Optimize output for PWM Description: Transform from the two-axis rotating d-q frame to the two-axis stationary frame -. Transform from the stationary two-axis - frame to the stationary three-axis, 3-phase reference frame. Optimize output for PWM

MaskInport.Name: Ud
MaskInport.Description: d voltage axis in rotating system

MaskInport.Name: Uq
MaskInport.Description: q voltage axis in rotating system

MaskInport.Name: UdHF
MaskInport.Description: HF injection to the d axis

MaskParameter.Name: HF_InjectionPolarity
MaskParameter.Prompt: HF injection polarity (Adding or subtracting from Ud)
MaskParameter.Description:
Adding to Ud --> Non inverting
Subtract from Ud --> Inverting

ImplementationParameter.Name: HF_InjectionPolarity
ImplementationParameter.Description: HF injection polarity (Adding or subtracting from Ud) Adding to Ud --> Non inverting Subtract from Ud --> Inverting

ImplementationParameter.Name: HF_InjectionPolarity
ImplementationParameter.Description: HF injection polarity (Adding or subtracting from Ud) Adding to Ud --> Non inverting Subtract from Ud --> Inverting

ImplementationParameter.Name: HF_InjectionPolarity
ImplementationParameter.Description: HF injection polarity (Adding or subtracting from Ud) Adding to Ud --> Non inverting Subtract from Ud --> Inverting

ImplementationParameter.Name: HF_InjectionPolarity
ImplementationParameter.Description: HF injection polarity (Adding or subtracting from Ud) Adding to Ud --> Non inverting Subtract from Ud --> Inverting
